Our Story Unfolds

At DriveWise Insure, we are dedicated to delivering exceptional auto insurance with a personal touch. Our mission is to ensure every driver is protected with affordable, comprehensive coverage tailored to their unique needs.

History

Founded in 2005, DriveWise Insure began as a small startup with the vision of providing affordable, comprehensive auto insurance to a diverse clientele. Over the years, we've expanded our services and reach, adapting to new technologies and evolving market needs while maintaining our commitment to customer care. Today, DriveWise Insure is recognized as a trusted leader in the insurance industry, dedicated to protecting drivers with innovative and reliable insurance solutions.

Facts

  • 95%

    DriveWise Insure proudly holds a 95% customer satisfaction rating, reflecting our commitment to exceptional service and support.

  • 180

    Since inception, we expanded our services to drivers in over 180 countries, demonstrating our global reach and reliability.

  • 24/7

    We offer 24/7 customer support, ensuring that help is always just a phone call away, any time of the day or night.

Dedicated to integrity, customer focus, and innovation in auto insurance.

  • Integrity

    We uphold the highest standards of honesty and transparency in every interaction.

  • Customer-Centric

    Our policies and services are designed with the customer’s best interest at heart, ensuring satisfaction and trust.

  • Innovation

    We embrace technology and innovation to enhance our services and provide cutting-edge insurance solutions.

Our Team

  • Michael Johnson

    Director of Operations

    Michael Johnson manages day-to-day operations and is pivotal in streamlining processes at DriveWise Insure. His expertise in operational efficiency and commitment to service excellence play a crucial role in enhancing customer experiences and operational agility.

  • John Smith

    CEO

    John Smith brings over 20 years of experience in the insurance industry to his role as CEO of DriveWise Insure. His visionary leadership focuses on innovation and customer satisfaction, guiding the company to new heights in the competitive insurance market.

  • Linda White

    Chief Financial Officer

    Linda White oversees the financial strategies of DriveWise Insure, ensuring sustainable growth and fiscal health. With a keen analytical mind, she has been instrumental in driving the company's financial planning and risk management since joining in 2010.

Contact Us

Future Goals

DriveWise Insure is dedicated to reshaping the future of auto insurance through cutting-edge technology and customer-focused innovations. Our goals include expanding our digital footprint to enhance user experiences and increasing our market share through strategic partnerships and global expansion. We are committed to sustainability and community involvement, aiming to not only grow our business but also make a positive impact on society.
